events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your website but I want to return it because it doesn't fit well.
The issue was categorized under Refund based on customer's request to return the product.
The support case has been assigned to customer service representative Emily to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to help you with the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the item has been used or damaged in any way?
My order number is 457890123, and the jacket is brand new, I just tried it on and found it too small.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund if you return the jacket within 14 days in original condition.
Thanks for the quick response. The return policy sounds good; please send me the return instructions.
I've emailed you the prepaid shipping label and the step-by-step return instructions. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Your return is now set up, and once we receive the jacket, we will process the refund immediately.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you successfully returned the jacket and received your refund.
Yes, I shipped it yesterday and received the refund today. Thank you for your help!
Closing the case as the refund was completed successfully and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to the customer to collect feedback on their support experience.
